data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is to implement a statistics package for BIE(Biological
    Integrated Environments). It will be a full functional statistics
    system. It transplants all central statistics functions from R(the
    famous statistics language), not just a wrapper as Statistics::useR,
    Statistics::R, and R::YapRI. It speaks statistics in Perl accent.
